=== `db_row()` ===

nullable dictionary db_row(string query [, Databse database])

|| *`database`* || `[optional]` Database connection. If not specified, the default connection is used. ||
|| *returns* || <div>Returns a `dictionary` where keys are field names and values are field values in the selected record.</div> <div>If no result is found for the `query` then `null` is returned.</div> ||
